furniture.Name: Marble Display Tables (set of 2)
furniture.Body:
With a hint of art deco, these beautiful marble display tables will really make a statement in your home. The design of this set of tables means they fit snugly inside each other making them a great space saver. Ideal next to your favourite chair or in a lounge to create the perfect spot for a small lamp. Each piece of quality marble is unique and colour and veins will vary on each piece.

lighting.Name: Mayfair Rose Gold Wall Lamp
lighting.Body:
Metallics have never been so on-trend and we can see why. This gorgeous wall lamp goes with many different styles and colours. With a lustrous and simple silhouette and a combination of modern and antique design, this globe wall lamp is the perfect accent for any contemporary home.

Product Size: 23 x 15 x 28cm

mirror.Name: Manhattan Round Mirror (100cm)
mirror.Body:
Wall mirror size: 100cm color: black edge, normal mirror material: metal / iron Finish: powder coating

Product Size: 100 x 100 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Arched Rome Mirror
mirror.Body:
The Arched Rome Mirror is a great way to add a sense of open space to your home with the arched window design and light reflecting mirrored glass. Simple and elegant, its delicate frame is finished in black powder coated iron for a look that will beautifully harmonise with your existing décor.

Product Size: 60 x 100 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Black Manhattan Round Mirror - Medium
mirror.Body: The perfect blend of light and dark, the Black Manhattan Round Mirror adds a hint of industrial simplicity to any home. This mirror reflects light and space throughout your room while creating a minimalist vibe you'll love. At 80cm wide it's as big as it is beautiful and the slim black frame comes ready prepared with handy hanging holes, perfect for an instant uplift wherever you put it.

mirror.Name: Manhattan Window Mirror (120x80cm)
mirror.Body:
Create the illusion of a bigger and brighter room with this beautiful Manhattan Window Mirror. With an antique black metal finish, this simple and understated mirror brings a voguish persona to any room. Hung on a wall or set securely on a piece of furniture, this mirror will be a great addition to any industrial or contemporary space.

Product Size: 120 x 80 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Pink Copper Round Mirror
mirror.Body:
What’s not to love about the metallic trend? It promotes vibrancy and energy to open up and transform a space. This curvaceous copper mirror is versatile and compliments many colour schemes and styles. Lustrous and refined, it demands the power as a focal point in the lounge area or as a way for illuminating up a hallway.

Product Size: 50 x 55 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Horizontal Arch Mirror - Black
mirror.Body:
This Arch Mirror is a striking design that will act as a statement piece in any room, hang it on a wall to make a room look bigger, as well as adding more light and style to your space. This black shade adds an industrial twist and is incredibly on-trend. 

Product Size: 120 x 80 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Bird Mirror Tray
mirror.Body:
A sparkling addition to any home. Made with mirror glass, this luminous tray exudes art deco glamour and shines on side tables or atop ottomans.

Product Size: 40 x 40 x 4.5cm

mirror.Name: Gold Manhattan Round Mirror - Large
mirror.Body: Round off your home furnishings perfectly with this Gold Manhattan Round Mirror. Ideal for hanging in the hallway or lounge, or above your dressing table in the bedroom. It's slender gold frame offers simple and subtle styling as well as providing the illusion of space and injecting extra light into a room. It gives you the perfect place to take a glimpse at your look before you leave for the day. At 100cm wide it's as big as it is beautiful and the slim gold frame comes ready prepared with handy hanging holes, perfect for an instant uplift wherever you put it.

mirror.Name: Round Mirror with Leather Strap
mirror.Body:
This strapping mirror is a real statement piece to any room. The real leather strap and black metal frame demand attention as a feature piece. With an ambience of confidence, this round mirror is a great way to brighten your surroundings. Place this mirror in your bathroom or bedroom for an industrial style finish.

Product Size: 40 x 40 x 2cm

mirror.Name: 5 Circles Mirror
mirror.Body:
Give the illusion of a bigger and brighter room with the quality circles mirror. The golden metal frame holds the five rounded mirrors together to create a new dimension to the room. Fix on to a plain wall for a minimalistic look that will add simple character to your living space.

Product Size: 60 x 1.5 x 38cm

mirror.Name: Modern Pane Mirror - Black
mirror.Body:
This Pane Mirror gives off an antique feel,  the design is strong and modern. Sometimes all you need is a classic design to make the desired impact you're looking for, the metal frame is sturdy and it is useful for giving the feeling of space in smaller rooms. 

Product Size: 120 x 80 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Gold Arched Rome Mirror
mirror.Body:
The Rome Arched Mirror is on trend and offers that warm pop of gold that will create a subtle statement, this mirror is the ideal size to be placed above a console table or in a living area.

Mirror size: W60 x H100 x D2 cm

mirror.Name: Horizontal Arch Mirror - Gold
mirror.Body:
This Arch Mirror is a striking design that will act as a statement piece in any room, hang it on a wall to make a room look bigger, as well as adding more light and style to your space. This gold shade is very popular within modern homes.

Product Size: 120 x 80 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Roman Window Mirror - Gold
mirror.Body:
Complete a room with this Roman Window Mirror, available in two modern shades. It's unique shape adds an elegant twist to an otherwise simple design, hanging this mirror will reflect natural light and add style. 

Product Size: 90 x 50 x 2cm

mirror.Name: Nest Effect Metal Round Mirror
mirror.Body:
This black round mirror effortlessly brings a touch of industrial chic to the home, the circular mirror has metal woven around the outside to create an abstract look. It's shade makes it easy to style and it's size and design makes it eye-catching. 

90 x 90 x 2 cm

mirror.Body: A bowl with a difference, this gold accessory is so versatile and looks fantastic stacked amongst other pieces or placed alone and used as a fruit bowl. How will you style this piece?

Product size: 47 x 36 x 3 cm

mirror.Body:
This mirror will add style to any room in a home or store, it's colourway is a modern choice which will complement an array of spaces. It is practical and timeless, available in two shades it can be propped up or hung to look effortless yet eye catching. 

Product Size: 120 x 80 x 2cm

mirror.Body:
This mirror will be a useful yet eye catching piece within a home, designed with windows in mind; we framed the mirror with black metal. Hang this mirror or lean it against a wall for a more casual look, this mirror is an effortless way to bring depth and light into your space.

Mirror size: 150H x 2D x 40W cm

plant-holders.Name: Large Stilts Plant Holder
plant-holders.Body:
Let your house plants do the talking with this sophisticated plant holder. It features an attractive symmetric frame. This planter is ideal for bringing a friendly touch of nature to your living space. The simplistic flowerpot is ideal as it goes with many colour schemes and styles. Just fill the plant pots with your favourite foliage.

Product Size: 15 x 15 x 91cm

*plant not included*

plant-holders.Name: Long Centrepiece Table Plant Holder
plant-holders.Body:
If you’re searching for a table centrepiece or window box with a difference, then look no further. Simple, modern and minimalistic, this aluminium planter will bring any area of your home to life with an injection of simplicity and beauty. This Aluminium planter is powder coated for a vibrant and durable finish, which offers a high resistance to the natural elements.

Product Size: 80 x 9 x 8cm

*plant not included*

plant-holders.Name: Small Stilts Plant Holder
plant-holders.Body:
Let your house plants do the talking with this luscious flowerpot. It is designed to be suspended and features an attractive symmetric frame. This planter is ideal for bringing a friendly touch of nature to your living space. The simplistic flowerpot is ideal as it goes with many colour schemes and styles. Just fill the plant pots with your favourite luscious foliage.

Product Size: 12.6 x 12.6 x 71cm

*plant not included*

plant-holders.Name: Large Plant Holder Stand
plant-holders.Body:
Create a luxurious botanical display with this luxe raised flowerpot. The golden hues and geometric style combined with the elevated look, creates an interesting and mesmerising contrast. Use this beautiful plant holder as a special place for your favourite houseplants to grow. Impress your visitors by presenting it as a table centrepiece at your next soiree.

Product Size: 21 x 21 x 90.5cm

*plant not included*

plant-holders.Name: Small Duo Black Hanging Plant Holder
plant-holders.Body:
You can bet that this impressive twin piece plant holder will be a treasure long after the botanical trend has gone. Hang up this planter for a natural aesthetic that pleases the eye and for an ambience of freshness in your home.

Product Size: 12.2 x 11.2 x 56cm

*plant not included*

plant-holders.Name: Stilts Navy Blue Plant Holder (30cm)
plant-holders.Body: This plant holder is a must have for the house plant lover, available in three sizes/heights. The navy shade makes plant colours pop. 30cm height, including stilts.

plant-holders.Name: Stilts Navy Blue Plant Holder (83cm)
plant-holders.Body: This plant holder comes in a gorgeous navy shade, the stilts add height and keep your plants out of reach from pets and little hands. This colour makes plants and flowers pop. 83cm in height, including slits.

plant-holders.Name: Stilts Navy Blue Plant Holder (60cm)
plant-holders.Body: This navy plant holder is the perfect height to be styled alone or amongst other plant pots, we stock three sizes of this planter. 60cm in height, including slits.

pouffes.Name: Round Mystique Blue Velvet Stool - Gold Finish
pouffes.Body:
Beautifully fashioned in a simplistic drum shape, this footstool adds perfect harmony to any room. The soft velvet material combined with the golden trim makes it the ideal piece to dress up quiet areas of your room. This luxurious stool is stylish and versatile, use it as an extra seat for when you have guests or as a table top at your soiree.

Product Size: 35 x 35 x 43cm

pouffes.Body:
Comfortable and trendy, these plush stools are a great way to add sophistication and elegance to your home. The round silhouette of the stool blends beautifully into any casual space. Simple, yet practical, these stools can be used as a footstool, extra seating for when you have guests over or even as a side table. Use one or bunch a few of them together to create a luxurious vibe in any room.

Beautiful stainless steel silver plated coffee table with marble glass top. Marble glass is a premium glass printed throughout layers. The glass does not stain easy like stone Marble, it's easily wipeable and will retain it's look.

Size: 120 x 60 x 45cm
Easy to assemble

Cleaning advice: As the metal is plated, it's advisable that you do not clean with any harsh detergents. It's best to use a metal polish, glass cleaner or water. Before trying a product for the first time, we recommend carrying out a spot test in an area not visible.

Ideal next to your favourite chair or in a lounge to create the perfect spot for a small lamp. Each piece of quality marble is unique and colour and veins will vary on each piece.

Product Size: 30 x 30 x 54 cm and 34 x 34 x 74 cm

tables.Name: Black Marble Side Table

wool.Name: Cashmere Wool Quilt - Natural Hex
wool.Body: This Cashmere Wool Quilt will offer you a comfortable nights sleep, as it will regulate your temperature and keep you cosy all year round.
